help mee:v​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

4. c. sits

5. c. travel agent

6. d. continents

Penjelasan:

4. Jawabannya c. sits karena kalimat menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense.

5. Jawabannya c. travel agent karena di airport ramai, sesuai menurut teks.

6. Indonesia terletak di antara dua benua (continents), yaitu benua Asia dan Australia.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Tuliskan manfaat air yang ditemukan ditempat tempat berikut!    A. Tanah
B. Sumur
C. Laut 
D. Sungai​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Air Tanah berfungsi Memenuhi berbagai keperluan rumah tangga, seperti mandi, memasak, minum, dan mencuci. Irigasi pertanian, pada sawah petani yang letaknya jauh dari sumber air seperti pada sungai umumnya kemudian akan membuat sumur bor untuk mencukupi berbagai kebutuhan air tanaman pertanian.

B. fungsi air sumur

1. Meminimalisir Genangan Air Hujan

2. mengurangi risiko banjir

3. menambah cadangan air tanah

Penjelasan:

maaf cuma segini, selebihnya cari di google ya kak

related_questions.question:
17. Rey    : What is your favorite menu at Janji Jiwa?
Dinda : I like brown sugar milk tea with cincau.
Rey : How does it taste?
Dinda : .... It is my favorite drink.​
How did you say to compare animal

This text is for questions 5-6    Sasha, sorry I can't come to your house to
night to do the Science project as we have
planned. My grandmother just came and she
wants me to accompany her to my aunt's
house. I will meet you at school tomorrow.
Erinda
__________________________
6. "... she wants me to accompany her...
The underlined word refers to...
A. Sasha's grandmother
B. Erinda's grandmother
C. My grandmother
D. My aunt
his text is for questions 7-8
ANNOUNCEMENT
​

EXERCISE FIVE    Give questions :-
?
1. Where
?
The two women lived in the same house.
2. How many
They each had a child.
?
3. What happened
It happened that one of the children died one night.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Where did the two women live?

2. How many child they have each?

3. What happened one night?

Penjelasan:

1. Kalimat dalam past tense, jadi pertanyaan menggunakan kata kerja did setelah kata tanya.

2. Menanyakan jumlah. Yang menjadi obyek dengan jumlah ditanyakan adalah 'a child'. Subyeknya adalah they yang merupakan kata ganti jamak, jadi kata kerja di pertanyaan menggunakan have.

3. Yang ditanyakan adalah apa, jadi peristiwa yang menjadi jawaban tidak disebutkan di pertanyaan.

related_questions.question: The............ month is............. april an june. isi titik2 nya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

the May month is between april and june

5. We learn speak English in our class. We speak English in our home!​

2. Tigers are found in Sumatera and Java
